entry.title: Bitcoin XT Fork
entry.summary: The compromising of Bitcoin is discussed in an email exchange between members of the bitcoin-dev mailing list. The conversation revolves around the possibility of Satoshi Nakamoto returning to active development and the potential impact on the community. Oliver Egginger, a member of the list, expresses his belief that Satoshi would be highly welcome by most people and that unanimity is critical for Bitcoin. He also notes that it is likely there will be a fork, which will result in humiliated people and bitterness on both sides. The conversation ends with a reminder about the importance of consensus and avoiding division within the community.
